com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.fieldtext

Class AbstractFieldText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.fieldtext.AbstractFieldText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldText
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FieldTextBuilder, FieldTextWrapper, Specifier

    public abstract class AbstractFieldText
extends Object
implements FieldText
    An abstract base-class that partially implements the FieldText interface using sensible defaults. Under specific circumstances, alternatives exist to subclassing AbstractFieldText directly:
    • Subclassing Specifier for an individual fieldtext specifier.
    • Making an immutable singleton, wrapped by FieldTextWrapper, if the expression is a constant.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Simple implementation that tests for emptiness using size() == 0. In most cases this should be overridden with a better implementation.
        Specified by:
        isEmpty in interface FieldText
        Returns:
        true if and only if size is 0.
